title: All-Inclusive: Dreamy Overwater Villa in the Maldives
description: Experience a euphoric nirvana in the untouched Maldives surrounded by a striking coral reef at the five-star, all-villa Shangri-Laâ€™s Villingili Resort & Spa nestled on two kilometres of white sandy beach. Stay in a huge 166sqm overwater villa linked by floating, timber pathways and indulge in breakfast, lunch, dinner, select alcoholic and soft drinks, James Bond-style return speedboat transfers, a personal island host and an AU$75 flight credit.
